mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with correct order of adjectives: I met, young two, beautiful, British girls at the airport

options.a: I met, young two, beautiful, British girls at the airport.
options.b: I met two beautiful, young, British girls at the airport.
options.c: I met two, British, young, beautiful girls at the airport.
options.d: I met two young, beautiful British girls, at the airport.
